title: EPIC: Settings & Safeguards
description: Contains FR-021 (Sound Settings) and FR-022 (Visual Performance Safeguards). Ensures user control over audio and graceful degradation on low-performance devices.

title: FR-022: Visual Performance Safeguards
description:
**Goal:** App remains usable on low-performance devices
**Success Definition:** Heavy animations degrade gracefully
**Dependencies:** FR-021

## Scope
- Detect reduced motion preference
- Automatically downgrade: Confetti glitch intensity, 3D rotation depth, Continuous animations (pause when offscreen)
- Display subtle 'Performance Mode' indicator when active

## UI States
- **Loading:** Performance check message hidden
- **Error:** Manual 'Reduce Effects' toggle appears

## UAT
- Enable reduced motion in OS → Reload app → animations simplified
- **Negative:** Full effects remain on capable devices
- **Cross-Device:** Applies on mobile browsers

## Out of Scope
User-configurable quality presets

FR-021: Sound Settings & Global Mute Control
description:
**Goal:** User can control audio playback across the experience
**Success Definition:** User can mute/unmute all sounds and setting applies immediately
**Dependencies:** FR-020

## System Boundary Matrix
- **Primary System:** Web UI
- **Interfaces:** Web Audio API
- **Data Contract Changes:** Add session-based audio preference

## Scope
- Add global sound control icon accessible from all screens
- Provide toggle states: Sound ON / Sound OFF
- Apply mute state to: Ringtone, Connection sound, Shutter, CD burn completion, Celebration/confetti sounds

## UI States
- **Loading:** Icon disabled briefly on toggle
- **Error:** Audio unavailable → icon shows muted with tooltip

## UAT
- Toggle sound off → trigger any sound event → no audio plays
- Toggle sound on → sounds resume
- **Negative:** Rapid toggles don't desync state
- **Cross-Device:** Works with mobile hardware mute respected

## Out of Scope
Per-sound volume sliders

title: FR-023: Accessibility Focus & Keyboard Navigation
description:
**Goal:** Keyboard and assistive users can complete the full journey
**Success Definition:** All primary actions reachable without mouse/touch
**Dependencies:** FR-022

## Scope
- Define visible focus states for all interactive elements
- Ensure logical tab order across screens
- Enable keyboard activation for: Pick up call, Gift card reveal, SNAP, Redeem, Game tiles, Reboot system

## UI States
- **Error:** Focus trap fallback resets focus to top-level container

## UAT
- Navigate entire app using keyboard only
- Trigger key actions successfully
- **Negative:** Focus never disappears
- **Cross-Device:** External keyboard on tablet works

## Out of Scope
Screen reader narration tuning

title: FR-029: Full Journey Reset (Soft Reset)

**Success Definition:** App resets without reload
**Dependencies:** FR-028

- Return user to Flip Phone screen
- Preserve accessibility and sound settings

## UI States
- **Loading:** 'RESETTING SYSTEM…'
- **Error:** Manual refresh prompt

## UAT
- Complete journey → Trigger reset → Start from beginning
- **Negative:** No stale UI remains
- **Cross-Device:** Reset reliable on mobile

## Out of Scope
Hard reload behavior

title: FR-024: Text Contrast & Readability Validation
description:
**Goal:** All text remains readable under visual overlays
**Success Definition:** WCAG 2.1 AA contrast met
**Dependencies:** FR-023

## Scope
- Validate text contrast against: CRT scanlines, Halftone noise
- Apply conditional background plates behind text if needed
- Preserve aesthetic while ensuring legibility

## UI States
- **Loading:** Contrast validation not user-visible
- **Error:** 'High Contrast Mode Enabled' badge

## UAT
- Inspect all screens
- Confirm text readable in bright/dim environments
- **Negative:** Overlays never obscure system messages
- **Cross-Device:** Mobile readability verified

## Out of Scope
Theme switching
